metadata.name: Process Creation Using Sysnative Folder
metadata.comment: Detects process creation events that use the Sysnative folder (common for CobaltStrike spawns)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\sysnative\\')) AND contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\sysnative\\')))

output.summary: Detects process creation events that use the Sysnative folder (common for CobaltStrike spawns)
